result.execSummary:
The defendant Clever D Escobar was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Waukesha County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

Submit to an AODA assessment, follow through with any treatment, counseling.  No use or possession of alcohol or illegal drugs/drug paraphernalia. Comply with random urine screens.  Maintain absolute sobriety. No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription. Valid prescriptions only with prior agent approval and to be taken only in the manner they are ordered. Inform agent of all prescriptions.
Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.

Provide DNA Specimen unless previously obtained, surcharge is imposed. Maintain full time employment and/or school combination. Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by agent. 
  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

timeConds.notes: STAYED for use at agent's discretion. Agent to determine with or without non-working hours.
To be completed as a condition of probation as directed by agent.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clever D Escobar

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Case Status Change - Revoked - Sentenced to Jail/HOC.  Wis. Dept. of Corrections notice of case status change received.  Outstanding financial obligations have been converted to a civil judgment.
Notice of Failure to Meet Conditions for Expungement filed by DOC.
Sentencing hearing at 01-13-2016 08:30 am
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Adam J. Schleis.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Attorney Schleis request the Court set the matter for sentencing in a few weeks.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 13, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 12-21-2015 08:30 am

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Adam J. Schleis.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Schleis requests an adjournment to allow time for additional negotiations with the State.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 12-07-2015 02:30 pm

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court with attorney Adam J. Schleis.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Schleiss requests matter be set for resolution.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 7, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
Hearing at 10-19-2015 08:30 am
Attorney appears by authorization

Attorney Adam J. Schleis in court.   Defendant Clever D Escobar did not appear.   Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Attorney appears by authorization. Defense has discovery and an offer. Defense requests another date in 30 days to meet with his client and discuss this matter. Defense to advise on the next date how they will proceed.  Hearing scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Hearing at 09-21-2015 10:30 am

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation and is to return by 9:30 today. Case recalled with same appearances.   Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed. Court will give another date.  Hearing scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Hearing on August 31, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation or seek other counsel. Court will give another date in 3 weeks.  Hearing scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Hearing on August 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Clever D Escobar in court.  Lindsey Hirt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY THE COURT.  Hearing scheduled for August 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
